snippet.title: SURREALISTa Game - Tribute to Giorgio de Chirico
snippet.description:
8 FANTASTIC PAINTINGS TO EXPLORE IN 3D !

Exploration game over metaphysical painter Giorgio de Chirico.

GET THE GAME HERE!
https://gigoiastudios.itch.io/surrealista

Walk inside famous de Chirico's metaphysical paintings while hearing to beautiful baroque music.

You can explore 8 paintings:

- The Song of Love
- The melancholy of departure
- Piazza d'Italia
- The anxious journey
- Turin Spring
- The nostalgia of infinite
- The red tower
- The enigma of the hour

For PC, Mac. Keyboard and mouse controls.

* The use of videos / games / soundtracks belonging to Gigoia Studios are for personal entertainment only and can not be marketed, altered, resold or used for other purposes without prior authorization from Gigoia Studios.
Gigoia Studios videos are under YouTube Standard License.

FOLLOW US:

Website: https://www.gigoiastudios.com/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gigoiastudios/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/gigoiastudios

Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@gigoiastudios

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gigoiastudios/

Bandcamp: https://gigoiastudios.bandcamp.com/

Veer.tv: https://veer.tv/vr/gigoiastudios/home

LinkedIn: https://pt.linkedin.com/company/gigoiastudiosart

Bags, Wall Art, Pillows, Mobile Case, T-Shirts: https://society6.com/gigoiastudios

#surrealism #games #giorgiodechirico
